title: Roast duck breast, wild garlic gnocchi, five spice, oranges and caramel
description: This recipe combines sweet honeyed duck breast with fragrant wild garlic gnocchi - impossible to resist!
ingredients: 2 large handfuls wild garlic, washed and picked (reserve any flowers for garnish)
crushed sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
drizzle extra virgin olive oil, to serve
